dialog.text:
Some enemies have invulnerable shields protecting them.  Hints on how to break the shields are provided under the enemy health bar. Some can only be broken using a special set of fighting moves.

Example: 
Popup Shield requires the player to perform the popup move:
$ATTACK, $ATTACK, $SMASH
